text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Maruzen-san, for buying me a drink.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: No worries! I just wanted to thank you for being down with my drive-date the other day.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: So, how did you fare? All smooth?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hehe, indeed. The frustrations that have haunted me lately… seems to have blown away in the wind.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hmm hmm, that's good to know!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … I knew it. I think we have a lot in common.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: So…! If you're ever bugged out again, hit me up for a drive! Cool?♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: As I'm always in your debt, allow me to invite you to a tea party sometime.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Absolutely okey-dokey with me! Drop me an invite any time☆
